quest.name: There's Always a Stupider Fish
journal:
Uin Nee's latest scheme is even fishier than usual.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
objectives: Check the fish trap at the designated location.
Deliver the fish-filled trap to Uin Nee.

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: Tyr Beq tells me that the land called “Amh Araeng” is nothing like Il Mheg. It's a dry, hot place where hardly anything grows. No flowers, no rivers, no lakes!

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: Some of the children there have never even seen a fish before! Imagine that! And yes, I think we both know where this is going...

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: That's right! I want you to bring me a fish to show the children in the Garden of Dreams. A nice, pretty one with shiny scales!

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: Now, this level of preparedness may come as a surprise, but I've already had one of my underlings set a trap down in Deepwood Swim. Much easier than messing about with hooks and whatnot. All you have to do is go and see if we've caught anything!

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: So? What have you got for me?

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: Oh, yes. These are...rainbowy twinkle trout. That's what we'll call them. I have big plans for you, little ones! You won't be swimming in boring old water like all the other fish, you'll be soaring through the skies of Lyhe Mheg!

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: And if we catch some more of these, they can all fly together to make a giant fish-rainbow! Ha ha! It's no wonder everyone thinks I'm a genius!
